name: Kickshot
description: Kickshot is a first-person speedrunning game in which you utilize your tools, environment and movement abilities to complete the course as quickly as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: i3-8300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: i7-4790k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
